reviewText:
Imagine 13 gorgeous Playmates competing in games where they get wet and covered in cream.  They also wear bikinis most of the time.  And they run.  And bounce.  A lot.
This is a departure from the normal Playboy videos because there are, thankfully, none of those stomach churning jump cuts that their editors seem to like so much and also very little nudity but it's by far the sexiest video I've seen from Hef's crew.
If you're still not convinced, I'll tell you one more thing:  Roberta Vasquez gets oiled up in a bikini.....
